## XForm.otherToThis() method

Transform coordinate in other coordinate space to local space

**Signature:**

```typescript
otherToThis(other: XForm, v: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [XForm](doc/markdown/./scene.xform.md) | The other coordinate space |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | point or vector in other coordinate space |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output result |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The transformed local space coordinate
